resources.string: Please help us by completing the information below if you find the certificate suspicious
Kenya National Examination Council labels posses multiple security features some of which can be checked by the human eye or electronically.

This app allows you to verify the authenticity of these labels as they appear on different certificates issued by KNEC. The most recent certificates contain a secure QR Code image that can be verified using the scanner provided in this app.

In addition to scanning excise, A report can be filed for any instance of a suspicious certificate. This would include where labels are not properly labeled or not placed as they should be and also in case of a mismatch in the results after scanning with the certificate presented.
Each report is filed and sent to the certificate issuing institution for clarification.
Password must be greater than 6 characters!
We just need your email address to help you reset your password
